entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
